overview: Alice, a young translator, finds the real world slowly merging with her recurring nightmares as she tries to solve the puzzle of her recent memory loss.  A postcard leads her to the island of Garma where the locals seems to know her.  Is she who she thinks she is?  And what significance does her dream of an astronaut abandoned on the moon have?
tagline: Ecstasy beyond passion. Possession beyond lust. It is the ultimate fulfillment.
title: Footprints
